PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-09752020-12-04ECCC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectOff-road Compression-Ignition (Mobile and Stationary) and Large Spark-Ignition Engine Emission Regulations
PrecisOFF-ROAD COMPRESSION-IGNITION (MOBILE AND STATIONARY) AND LARGE SPARK-IGNITION ENGINE EMISSION REGULATIONS in order to (1) reduce air pollutant emissions from off-road engines; (2) introduce new emission standards and requirements in alignment with the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency's standards for large spark-ignition and stationary compression-ignition engines; (3) address Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations concerns regarding clarity and inconsistency and introduce minor consequential amendments to two other vehicle and engine emission regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0258 Publication Date: 2020-12-23
AttachmentsAttachment
